netCDF_description: description variable attribute in netCDF files
calc_suffix_n_prefix: prefix or suffix of field calculated in runStatsForLinePlots()
label: Description (label) in Regions.writeStats()
units_in_mosaics: Units indicated in Mosaics, except for albedos
units_in_map: Units indicated in stat files, in stc files for snow_cover_days, in mosaic files for albedo.
netCDF_units: units attribute for netCDF files (must be UDUNITS, ref: https://ncics.org/portfolio/other-resources/udunits2/
multiplicator_for_mosaics: Factor by which we multiply the value of the variable in the stc intermediary file to obtain the value inserted in Mosaic files.
divisor: Factor multiplied by min-max values to get the min-max values in Mosaics. Divisor applied on mosaic values to obtain PublicMosaic/geotiff value. Other divisors are extracted form Mosaics/or this file for runStatsLineFor, and hardcoded for STCSCAG_DRFS_snow.
nodata_value: No data value inserted in intermediary and mosaic files which type is integer (and not single/double).
nodata_value_web: No data value inserted in geotiff or other files sent to the snowToday frontend.
value_for_unreliable: Value for pixels below thresholds (handled within Mosaic) inserted in Mosaics or other intermediary files.
value_for_unreliable_web: Value for pixels below thresholds (handled within PublicMosaic) inserted in geotiff or other files sent to the snowToday frontend.
min: Minimal value of the variable (in Mosaics)
max: Maximal value of the variable (in Mosaics)
test_calc_albedos: 1: the variable is integrated in the unit test of Variables.calcAlbedos(). 0: the variable is not integrated.
test_calc_snow_cover_days: 1: the variable is integrated in the unit test of Variables.calcSnowCoverDays(). 0: the variable is not integrated.
test_write_mosaic: 1: the variable is integrated in the unit test of Mosaic.runWriteFiles(). 0: the variable is not integrated.
write_geotiffs: 1: a geotiff is generated for the variable in Step3 (regions.runWriteGeotiffs()). 0: no geotiff generated.
write_mosaics: 1: the variable is inserted in the daily mosaic data file in Step2 (mosaic.runWriteFiles()). 0: the variable is not inserted.
write_stats_csv: 1: the variable is integrated in statistic calculation. 0: the variable is not integrated.
write_stc: 1: the variable is integrated in stc. 0: the variable is not integrated.
write_netCDF_v2022_0: 1: the variable is integrated in statistic calculation. 0: the variable is not integrated.
write_netCDF_v2023_1: 1: the variable is written to ESPnetCDF files 0:not written
mosaicSubsetSCAGDRFS: 1: the variable is inserted in the modscagdrfs raw file. 0: the variable is not inserted
modis_source_name: Name of the variable in the modis original file we import during Step0
modis_source: Indicates whether the variable originates from mod09ga .hdf file, modscag .dat file or moddrfs .dat file, all files being imported in Step0
mod09ga_bitPosition: If the variable is a bit-part of the modis composite variable, indicate the bit-position of the variable. E.g. cloud is a bit-part of state_1km_1, and bit-position is 0. If the variable is fully extracted from the modis variable, modis_bitPosition = 255 (no data).
mod09ga_bitCount: If the variable is a bit-part of the modis composite variable, indicate the number of bits that the variable occupies. If modis_bitPosition = 255, this field is not considered.
mod09ga_resamplingFactor: Indicates if the variable is in a lower resolution than the expected, by which factor we need to resample. E.g. if expected is 500m, and the variable is in 1000m, resamplingFactor = 2.
spires_name: Name of the variable returned by the spires.core.run_spires() method.
spires_weightFactor00: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 0. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor01: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 1. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor02: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 2. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor03: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 3. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor04: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 4. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor05: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 5. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor06: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 6. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor07: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 7. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor08: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 8. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor09: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 9. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor10: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 10. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor11: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 11. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor12: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 12. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor13: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 13. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor14: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 14. For spires smoothing only.
spires_weightFactor15: Smoothing-weight if the variable = 15. For spires smoothing only.

netCDF_long_name: STC-MODSCAG/MODDRFS snow albedo on flat surface
netCDF_description: Reflected fraction of broadband (0.28-4.00 micrometer) solar radiation, based on optical grain size accounting for darkening by light-absorbing impurities, no adjustment to account for slope and aspect of the terrain

name: Snow Albedo
netCDF_description: Reflected fraction of broadband (0.28-4.00 micrometer) solar radiation, based on optical grain size accounting for darkening by light-absorbing impurities, and adjusted to account for slope and aspect of the terrain
label: Median Regional Snow Albedo

name: Decrease in visible Albedo from Dust and Soot
Snow Radiative Forcing
netCDF_description: Additional energy absorbed by the snowpack from light-absorbing impurities assuming a clear sky
label: Median Regional Snow Radiative Forcing

name: Snow Cover Percent
netCDF_long_name: STC-MODSCAG on the ground snow fraction
netCDF_description: Viewable snow fraction corrected for canopy obstruction using forest height and vegetation fraction
label: Total Snow Cover Area

name: Viewable Snow Cover Percent
netCDF_description: Snow fraction from surface reflectance visble from satellite

label: Mask observed / interpolated
comments: not to indicate in mosaicSubsetSCAGDRFS, but we do insert in raw files

label: Number of days without observation
comments: Not to indicate in write_mosaics, but we do insert after generating the Mosaic
